channel.title: Homes on Isaac Changhau
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Isaac Changhau

item.description: Biography I am a Research Engineer at Institute of High Performance Computing, Singapore under A*STAR (AI Programme). I have varied interests including but not limited to programming, machine learning techniques and artificial intelligence. Specifically, I find working on imparting human capabilities of understanding language to machines interesting, and hence have been involved in several research projects at the nexus of natural language processing and machine learning. Currently, I am more focus on natural language processing tasks such as machine comprehension, neural sequence labeling, commonsense reasoning, and also any other attractive tasks involved machine learning techniques.

item.title: Achievements
item.description: Outstanding Graduate of Dalian University of Technology in 2015        Jun. 2015     |       Dalian University of Technology, China     |       Certificate Learning Excellence Award (Second Prize) in academic year of 2013~2014        Oct. 2014      |       Dalian University of Technology, China     |       Certificate Research Assistant, "Multi-terminal based Family Remote Control System" from Sep. 2013 to Sep. 2014        Sep. 2014     |       Dalian University of Technology, China     |       Certificate Teaching Assistant at Computer Installation and Test Laboratory, Sep. 2011 - Mar. 2014        Sep. 2014     |       Dalian University of Technology, China     |       Certificate
